Netflix has come under fire for teasing two plus-sized women in the premiere of its hit dating show Love is Blind's second series - but then dropping them for the remaining episodes. 
After the succ… [+5290 chars]

articles.author: Laura Bradley
articles.title: How Did 'Death on the Nile' Become Such a Publicity Nightmare? - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Armie Hammer, Russell Brand, Letitia Wright… enough embattled careers to fill the Nile!
articles.content: If Kenneth Branaghs Murder on the Orient Express felt a little queasy to watch thanks to Johnny Depp, the directors follow-up, Death on the Nile, seems downright noxious. The second of Branaghs Agath… [+7095 chars]
